levels.description: Gradually gains <@ba.vup>{value}</> DP over the skill duration. Attack Interval <@ba.vdown>slightly increases</>, Attack Range <@ba.vup>+{ability_range_forward_extend}</> tile, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, attack all blocked enemies and perform an additional attack against targets with less than 50% HP
